name: Detective Froggy-Doo
description:
🐸A murder has occurred in a Frog-Populated town! They call on you! Detective Froggy-Doo in order to solve this murder mystery!

🔪Speak with townsfolk to dig up dirt on who could have wanted Gwen Steffroggy killed and why. 

🔎Keep an eye out for visual clues, those may help you in solving the murder!

⏳However, you need to act fast! The department has given you a limited time frame or else they will move the case to the "Major Crimes" department and it will be out of your hand.

This game was made in under 3 days and entered in the "Mini Jam 106" with the theme of: Frogs!

In the future, we may update it to include chapters and continue with more and more murder mysteries with more detail!

Level Music By: 8BitBaka
